title: Hour 1 - QB Controversy in New England, Autographs, Ross Tucker
itunes:title: Hour 1 - QB Controversy in New England, Autographs, Ross Tucker
description:
Dan thinks there is a real QB controversy with the New England Patriots even though HC Bill Belichick won't admit anything. He also addresses the allegations that some game officials asked Tampa Bay Buccaneers WR Mike Evans for an autograph after the game. And NFL insider Ross Tucker stops by to break down week 7 of this NFL season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
